Browsers Evolt Org Downtime

04 Sep 1999

7:00PM CST: There will be some scheduled maintainence on the server that runs browsers.evolt.org. It will be down for about 30 minutes tonight.

9:30PM CST: Back up and running. Sorry about the extended delay, had some kernel issues :)
